Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2016 10:40AM LuckyDuck7 wrote: I recently tested positive for Rad51C mutation. But I also tested positive for BRCA1 :/ Because of how BRCA1 operates, it basically plays a trump card to my Rad51C, so all my recommendations are based off BRCA. I know that's not really helpful for you, but just wanted you to know there are other RAD people out there too!! Good luck :)
